q: Randy, Jennifer Lopez and Steve: can they be tough enough to please us? The nondescript man in the white shirt is singing, inasmuch as that verb can be applied, I Get a Kick Out of You. He is so off-key that the lyrics are the only clue to his song choice. This is the point on the old American Idol where Simon Cowell would deliver a devastatingly honest putdown while his fellow judges collapsed

Big Blog( mjsbigblog.com) says Idol is at a crossroads.`` With falling ratings and failing music sales and Simon Cowell leaving, something has to happen to rejuvenate the franchise,'' she says. I could see Idol going on for many years, but if they're going to remain culturally relevant, they have to have a really big year this year. Idol producers say change is standard for a long-running show- not an overreaction to ratings declines or an act of desperation.`` I think this is the most creative year for Nigel Lythgoe , who

prove he's more than just a pretty voice- and it seems that Simon Cowell agrees. The Mirror reports that Simon Cowell phoned his new signing from his mansion in Barbados during the festive break. Simon Cowell and Matt Cardle spoke over Christmas and texted ideas about what Matt Cardle wants to do. Simon Cowell has said that he wants him to write and co-write some songs. They know they want great material, if the songs are penned by Matt Cardle then even better. He's chuffed. for Nokia was Google-and indeed, Nokia's Stephen Elop was reportedly in talks with Google CEO Eric Schmidt about a potential deal. In the end, though, Stephen Elop decided( according to CNET) that Nokia would have difficulties differentiating within that ecosystem, and that all the`` value'' would have been`` moving to Google.'' In other words: with Microsoft's nascent Windows Phone OS, Nokia gets to be a big fish in a small pond

backup quarterback to one of the league's most electrifying players once again. On Monday, the mayor of Dallas made it clear that he wasn't involved in the decision to honour Michael Vick . The action taken was not sanctioned by my office and was not an official ceremonial honour on behalf of the city of Dallas, Mayor Tom Leppert said in a statement. He added that`` official keys to the city'' are presented by the mayor or an elected official designated by the mayor and are reserved for`` an elected official of

to dogfighting- a ceremonial key to the city over the weekend. Councilman Dwaine Caraway , who also is the city's mayor pro tem, presented the key to Michael Vick after the Philadelphia Eagles star I would like to personally present to Michael Vick the key to the city of Dallas, Texas. Michael Vick ... You deserve it. You earned it. War costs lives Donald Rumsfeld , who served as Bush's defence chief for six years after holding the the same job under president Gerald Ford in the 1970s, acknowledged that in a war, many things cost lives . But he had no regrets about his leadership for the wars in Iraq and Afghanistan- the latter now nearing its 10th anniversary.`` I think the world's a better place with Saddam Hussein

NFL Commissioner Roger Goodell presented the Pete Roselle trophy to him this morning. After accepting it, Aaron Rodgers talked about the journey that led him to the Super Bowl and a Championship win. Finally getting an opportunity and making the most of it, and this was another opportunity last night, they don't come around that often, i just wanted to make the most of it, we did as a team, a great team win, a great group of guys in the locker room, just really excited to be a part of it, said Aaron Rodgers . And Aaron Rodgers is getting even more MVP treatment tonight, where you can catch him on The Late Show with David Letterman . The show starts at 10:35 p.m. tonight, right after Channel
